text: Action Jackson is a 1988 American action movie directed by Craig R. Baxley and stars Carl Weathers, Vanity, Sharon Stone, Robert Davi, and Craig T. Nelson. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1988 action movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:American independent movies Category:1988 independent movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Detroit Category:Movies directed by Craig R. Baxley
title: Action Jackson (1988 movie)
